Severe CKD (Pa02<60mmHg) entitles the patient to exemption from co-payment under ALD 14.

question.title: What is the medical condition that entitles a patient to exemption from co-payment under ALD 14?
question.description: Severe CKD (Pa02<60mmHg) has what implication regarding ALD 14?

option_a.title: Chronic kidney disease with Pa02<40mmHg
option_a.description: A condition where the patient requires oxygen therapy

option_b.title: Severe CKD (Pa02<60mmHg)
option_b.description: A condition where the patient has a low PaO2 level

option_c.title: Chronic kidney disease with Pa02>80mmHg
option_c.description: A condition where the patient has a high PaO2 level

option_d.title: End-stage renal disease
option_d.description: A condition where the patient requires dialysis or a transplant

correct_option.title: Severe CKD (Pa02<60mmHg)
correct_option.description: A single letter indicating the correct option
